name: SubstanceUseDisorderShortActingMedication
title: Substance Use Disorder Short Acting Medication
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this Grouping value set is to represent concepts for short acting substance use disorder medications.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Medication.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent generic, human use and prescribable naltrexone, buprenorphine and buprenorphine (oral, sublingual) medications.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that represent non-prescribable or branded drugs and excludes concepts that represent components or ingredients. Excludes long acting implant and injection medications.)
